issue.title: Imaginative Intelligences: Creativity at the Dawn of AI
issue.source: Mozilla Foundation & Berggruen Institute: Imaginative Intelligences Assemblies Report

style_anchor.description: A reflective, probing, and intellectually playful voice—curious about ambiguity but precise about stakes, blending cultural reporting with essayistic introspection. The tone is thoughtful, empathetic, and occasionally wry, always foregrounding the human in the age of systems.
style_anchor.content: This issue explores the evolving relationship between creativity and artificial intelligence through reportage, essays, interviews, criticism, and inventive front-of-book features. Drawing on the insights of artists, technologists, and thinkers convened in the Imaginative Intelligences Assemblies, it investigates how systems can nurture, distort, or deepen the creative impulse.
